document_data.caption: Faceted andars.
document_data.name: Andar
document_data.mainbody: In [[Faer√ªn]], '''andar''' was the name for [[wikipedia:en:andalusite|andalusite]], a [[Semi-precious stones|semi-precious stone]] usually found in streambeds as tumbled pebbles or crystals with an average diameter of {{frac|2}} in (13 mm).
document_data.Description: Andar was a durable gemstone that could be facet-cut by a skilled [[Wikipedia:lapidarist|lapidarist]] to produce translucent gems with a green-red or brown-red flash. A typical stone had a base value of 50 [[gp]].
document_data.Powers: Combining powdered andar with a dragon scale ([[Gold dragon|gold]], [[Silver dragon|silver]], or [[Amethyst dragon|amethyst]]) and boiling produced an alternate ingredient that could be added to the oily base of a ''[[potion of treasure finding]]''.
